message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $125.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $105. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $120.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking $110 is a fair price.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I'm willing to go up to $122.50, but that's as high as I can go. Let me know if that works for you.
I'm still interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $115.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob, but I think I can do a bit better than that. I'll sell the product to you for $117.50. That's the best I can do.
